entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
